duties_responsibilities.duty: Packages and labels finished product according to customer/in-house requirements and packaging standards.
Responsible for making sure packaged products are accurately reflected on the packaging labels.
Effectively transports packaged materials to storage areas.
Transports and conveys raw materials from the storage area to the elevator, sending it to the hopper; using a forklift in an accurate and efficient manner.
Maintains resin/additive levels in blenders and hoppers.
Performs hopper/blender changeovers upon notification from production set-up.
Effectively handles and documents loose roll scrap for disposition as directed by the production supervisor.
Set-up and operation of production utility machinery per specifications.
Adheres to safety policies and reports all maintenance and safety issues immediately.
Participates in continuous improvement of operation.
Pursues the establishment and reinforcement of a high-performance work team environment.
Maintains good housekeeping practices and clean area as needed.
Works effectively with co-workers as a team member and support safe, quality production.
Performs and assists in other tasks as directed by supervision/management.
